title: [Black Moor, Wastelands]
description: Windblown patches of gorse and heather rise above the swirling eddies of mist, nearly concealing a narrow path that winds into the dark wooded area to the west.  The air is chilly and damp and filled with the constant whistling of the wind, punctuated by the occasional howl of some unknown creature echoing across the broken, blackened moor.

Windblown patches of gorse and heather rise above the swirling eddies of moonlit mist, nearly concealing a narrow path that winds into the dark wooded area to the west.  The night air is chilly and damp and filled with the constant whistling of the wind, punctuated by the occasional howl of some unknown creature echoing across the broken, blackened moor.
